Who: LEGACY, Tuscon, Perceptor, Quickstride, Straight Shot
Location: Caverns

OOC: I'm going to have to assume that Quickstride and Straight Shot
took the shuttle Talon had flown in back to the tunnel mouth near the
Black Fortress?? Since as it was discovered, the Black Fortress is in
Europe, and as we know the Ark is in North America. I believe that at
the point in time NBW's takes place that there is a land bound route
from the US to Europe, but it would take a very long time to traverse
it. :)

BIC:
Quickstride and Straight Shot find it relatively easy to reach the
area that Tuscon, Perceptor and Legacy are. The Ark's side of the
cavern is steep and sheer, but here on the European side, near the
Black fortress, it is sloped enough that a vehicle could drive up
without too much difficulty.

Ahead of Quickstride and Straight Shot, Legacy had been silent during
the trip so far, seemingly content to let the others take the lead.
His sensors had also locked in on Rodimus for a moment, and then like
the others lost him.

"Rodimus appeared to be in critical condition." Legacy said as he
walked, his cold cyclopean gaze attempting to pierce into the darkness
ahead. "I did not get an exact enough scan of that creature that held
him to get a positive identification, however I have no information on
what I gave scanned."

Tuscon's headlights stretched far ahead into the darkness, but beyond
the reach of them there was only darkness, or cave wall where the path
bent and turned. The venting steam that had obscured their vision had
slowed and then finally stopped. Ahead of them the tunnel appeared
clear, although there was still little sign of Rodimus or his apparent
abductor, save for the occasional scrape of metal on stone.

The noxious smell of magma still fills the air making the bean pod gas
from Quickstride hardly noticeable, mixed in as it was with all the
other strange odors. Also heat from the surrounding walls and floor
make this area very hot even for transformers, although it is still
bearable.

Ahead of Tuscon, Perceptor and Legacy some sort of movement of several
creatures can be made out, it does not look like Rodimus  . . .

(TAG)

Preston
